duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate and maintain facility systems including HVAC, plumbing, and fire suppression systems.
Troubleshoot and diagnose equipment issues, and perform necessary repairs.
Perform preventive maintenance and inspections according to industry best practices and standards.
Maintain and repair plumbing fixtures and systems.
Adhere to contract specifications and perform scheduled maintenance and repairs as required.
Maintain environmental certifications and licenses required for the role.

education_certification.credential: Licensed Stationary Operating Engineer (MD) or DC 3rd Class License, or DC First Class Boiler Operator (NAPE)
Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Universal CFC License, desirable
Factory Training for different boiler/chiller systems, desirable
